Subject: CiscoVPN disabling every 10-30 minutes
Description: Hello, Customer name is PrivatBank. They reported that CiscoVPN (Cisco Secure Client) disabling every 10-30 minutes when EPP client is installed, and because of it, the Internet access is dropping. Currently, the issue occurs only on 1 windows endpoint. We've found errors in logs, can you please check if it can be related?: 04-03 11:43:02.735 5072 ERROR wow64 helper returned error: 87 for pid: 3112, csc_ui, C:Program Files (x86)CiscoCisco Secure ClientUIcsc_ui.exe [cf::ApiDetourDllInjector::hook_wow64_process ApiDetourDllInjector.cpp:409] 04-03 11:43:02.735 5072 ERROR hooking failed 0x00000057 - 3112, 'csc_ui', image: 'DeviceHarddiskVolume2WindowsSystem32ntdll.dll', app: 'C:Program Files (x86)CiscoCisco Secure ClientUIcsc_ui.exe' [cf::ProcessMonitor::imageLoaded ProcessMonitor.cpp:247] I will attach the full log file and screenshots here.
What_We_Know__c:
2025.05.22: The issue is resolved when the  Advanced scanning option is off.
CiscoVPN (Cisco Secure Client) disabling every 10-30 minutes when EPP client is installed
Next_Steps__c:
2025.05.22: Suggested a process name to add to the scanning exception.
Asked to confirm if the issue remains with Advanced scanning off.
Solution_Comment__c: CiscoVPN (Cisco Secure Client) process name added to Advanced Scanning Exception.
